sentences.en: a time-lapse sequence of a flower opening
sentences.cn: 一组延时拍摄花蕾开放的镜头

sentences.en: As they remove each segment, they analyze its molecular sequence.
sentences.cn: 在除去每一片段时, 他们分析了片段的分子顺序.

sentences.en: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence .
sentences.cn: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

sentences.en: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence.
sentences.cn: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

sentences.en: Flip the camera to vertical, recompose . Shoot again. Same sequence, methodical.
sentences.cn: 把相机竖起来,重新构图, 再拍,同样的场景, 依次拍摄.

sentences.en: He described the sequence of events leading up to the robbery.
sentences.cn: 他描述了抢劫案发生前的一系列有关情况。

sentences.en: He had to attend a sequence of meetings.
It is not easy to establish the exact sequence of events.
sentences.cn: 要确定事态演变的明确结果,并不容易.

sentences.en: Only the opening sequence could claim to be genuinely innovatory.
sentences.cn: 只有开场片段能称得上是真正的创新。

sentences.en: Polling is a synchronous mechanism, where devices are serviced in sequence.
sentences.cn: 查询是一种同步机构, 其中的各个设备是依次接受服务的.

sentences.en: The above sequence of events is illustrated in Fig . 2.2 a - d .
sentences.cn: 上述事件的先后顺序由图2.2a -d 说明.

sentences.en: The best sequence in the film occurs when Roth stops at a house he used to live in.
sentences.cn: 电影中最棒的一组镜头出现于罗思在他曾住过的一幢屋子前驻足时。

sentences.en: The book is more satisfying if you read each chapter in sequence.
sentences.cn: 这本书依次读各章会更好.

sentences.en: The camera moved in on the hero for a close - up sequence.
sentences.cn: 摄影机向男主角移近,准备拍摄一组 特写 镜头.

sentences.en: The cultural relics are displayed in chronological sequence.
The project is nothing less than mapping every gene sequence in the human body.
sentences.cn: 这个项目就是要绘制人体所有基因序列的图谱。

sentences.en: Under these circumstances, this sequence of reactions would be gluconeogenic.
sentences.cn: 因此这一系列反应就是糖原异生作用.

words.tran_cn: 连续的；其次的；作为结果而产生的
连续的；相继的；有顺序的
程序装置，[计] 定序器

phrases.tran_cn: 氨基酸序列；氨基酸顺序
装配顺序；施工步骤；施工程序
核苷酸序列；核酸序列；核苷酸顺序
事件顺序，作业顺序；事故顺序记录，事情的进展
时间序列；时间程序，时间层序
n. 焊接顺序；熔接次序

trans.tran_cn: [数]数列，序列，顺序，连续，片断插曲
trans.tran_en: the order that something happens or exists in, or the order it is supposed to happen or exist in

trans.tran_cn: 使按顺序排列，安排顺序，[生化]确定…的顺序，确定…的化学结构序列
